named-query.name: product
named-query.query: select i, b from Item i, Bid b

named-query.name: scalarProduct
named-query.query: select i.id, i.name, i.buyNowPrice from Item i where i.auctionEnd > current_date()

named-query.name: transient
named-query.query: select u.id, u.username, u.homeAddress from User u

named-query.name: distinct
named-query.query: select distinct i.name from Item i

named-query.name: dynamicInstance
concat
named-query.query: select concat(concat(i.name, ': '), i.auctionEnd) from Item i

named-query.name: coalesce
named-query.query: select i.name, coalesce(i.buyNowPrice, 0) from Item i

named-query.name: caseWhen
named-query.query: select u.username, case when length(u.homeAddress.zipcode) = 5 then 'Germany' when length(u.homeAddress.zipcode) = 4 then 'Switzerland' else 'Other' end from User u

named-query.name: countDistinct
named-query.query: select count(distinct i.name) from Item i

named-query.name: minMax
named-query.query: select min(b.amount), max(b.amount) from Bid b where b.item.id = :itemId
